mapper.select: SELECT* FROM MOVIES M, FILMS F WHERE M.M_CD = F.M_CD AND F.FILM_STATUS = 1

SELECT DISTINCT(A.AREA_NAME),F.M_CD ,(SELECT DISTINCT(T.T_AREA) FROM FILMS F, SCREENS S, THEATERS T,AREAINFO A WHERE F.SCREEN_CD = S.SCREEN_CD AND S.T_CD = T.T_CD AND T.T_AREA = A.AREA_CD AND F.M_CD = #{m_cd} AND F.FILM_STATUS = 1) AS T_AREA FROM FILMS F, SCREENS S, THEATERS T,AREAINFO A WHERE F.SCREEN_CD = S.SCREEN_CD AND S.T_CD = T.T_CD AND T.T_AREA = A.AREA_CD AND F.M_CD = #{m_cd} AND F.FILM_STATUS = 1
